summary: TSA conducted about 28,000 inspections of U.S. airports and passenger airline operations in 2021. When a violation is found during an inspection, airports and air carriers can avoid civil penalties by investing their own resources as part of an action plan to find the root cause of a violation. title: Aviation Security Programs: TSA Should Clarify Compliance Program Guidance and Address User Concerns with Its Data Systems
